name: MechWarrior Online
content:
files:
- installer:
    filename: MWOPortalInstaller.exe
    url: https://mwomercs.com/go/download?id=b1e91bce837ce37bf914b9a02f54f8a4&filename=MWOPortalInstaller.exe
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Piranha Games/MWO Portal/MWO Portal.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: arial vcrun2010 dotnet471 win7
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.1
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /q
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
